import React from 'react' import Header from './Header/Header' import heroimage from "../images/hero_image.png" import hero_image_back from "../images/hero_image_back.png" import heart from "../images/heart.png" import calories from "../images/calories.png" import "./Hero.css" import {motion} from "framer-motion" const Hero = () => { const transition = {type : 'spring',duration : 3} return (
initial = {{left : '236'}} whileInView = {{left : '8px'}} transition= {transition} the best fitness club in the town
Shape Your
Ideal Body
in here we will help you to shape and build your ideal body and live up your life to fullest
+140expert coachs
+978members joined
+50fintness program
Heart Rate116 bpm
Calories Burned220 kcal
) } export default Hero
